titleStmt.title: An ansvver to some queries put out by one John Pendarves, in a book, called, Arrowes against Babylon, &c. For the people called, Quakers to answer.
titleStmt.author: Naylor, James, 1617?-1660.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed for Giles Calvert, at the Black-spread-Eagle neer the West end of Pauls.,

notesStmt.note: A reply to: Pendarves, John. Arrowes against Babylon.
Annotation on Thomason copy: "Jan: 25 1655"; also the last number of the imprint date has been marked through.
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
